Summary: It was bright it was floating in the sky and it looked like a star but it was just floating around no sound and it was round.
divs: Sighting Detailswell i went outside it was 10:26pm i went to bring my dog outside and when i looked up because i saw something bright in the side of my eye it was this strange light i have seen before but its been awhile ever sense i saw this light, it was bright round no sound at all and it stretched out like a star but it wasnt im sure it wasnt. i found this weird because it was raining like crazy today non stop from like 5:30pm to 8:30pm and when this was goin on an airplane went by this object i wonder if it saw it, i hope so. i tis time didnt get nervous i was anxious because last time i saw this it wasnt just one object i saw three floating in place and it just stayed there like for me to look at it, but tonight it did same i wanted to see more than just floating in place so i stood there lookin at it an it moved and stretched like a star after i got tired of looking at it i left inside the lasttime i saw this it was like this same time very weird
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Leominster
There were no other sightings in Leominster on or around September 13th 2010
